item.title: Rogue Piece Codes (November 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Rogue Piece monthly redeem codes for November 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free Gems and Cash. 

Rogue Piece is an exciting anime-based Roblox game that is based on the ultra-popular anime series One Piece, while also taking inspiration from various other anime shows. Players progress through the game by exploring various islands, defeating enemies along the way to get stronger and level up. The enemies that players will have to face get stronger as the game progresses, which makes grinding that much harder, and that’s where Rogue Piece codes can be of use to players. The codes will provide players with some much-needed resources, which can be used to get stronger weapons and upgrade existing abilities. 

Active Rogue Piece Codes 

  • 2MVisits!: Gems and Cash (NEW)
  • SorryForAlotBugs: Gems and Cash (NEW)
  • 9KLikes!: Gems and Cash (NEW)
  • 1MVisits!: Gems and Cash (NEW)
  • 5KFavs!: Gems and Cash (NEW)
  • Beginner: Gems and Cash (NEW)

Expired Rogue Piece Codes 

  • 1KFavorite
  • Buggy
  • MBFORSHUTDOWN
  • 800KVisits!
  • INeeDmOREfISh
  • SorryForShutdown
  • 150KVisits!
  • Mini
  • AWSDown
  • RELEASE
  • SorryForDelay
  • RaceUpdate
  • 7KLikes!
  • 10KMembers
  • Treachery
  • 2KLikes
  • 1KActive
  • 1KLikes!
  • 50KVisits!
  • Halloween
  • 10KVisits!

How To Redeem Rogue Piece Codes

Many Roblox games nowadays require players to complete certain steps before they’re able to redeem codes in the respective game. Some require players to follow the social media profiles of the developers, while others force players to join the game’s official Discord server before the code redemption feature gets unlocked for them. 

Rogue Piece, however, doesn’t fall into the category. Redeeming codes in Rogue Piece is as simple as navigating through the menus and inputting one of the active codes given above into the correct text box. For newer players of the game who may be unfamiliar with the Roblox menu ecosystem, here’s a detailed step-by-step guide to redeeming codes:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Rogue Piece.
  2. Click on the settings button on the left side of the screen.
  3. Scroll down till you see the ‘code’ text box.
  4. Input one of the active codes given above into the text box.
  5. Click the ‘Enter’ button to claim your reward.

How To Get More Rogue Piece Codes

The developers of Rogue Piece often drop new codes during updates or special events, which means that the next set of codes could be released very soon. However, tracking the release of these codes can be a hassle, as it requires players to comb through the game’s social media handles or Discord server regularly. Instead, the easiest way for players to stay up to date with the latest codes would be to bookmark this page. We update this article immediately after any new codes are dropped, making it your one-stop shop for all things Roblox codes.

While you’re getting involved in Roblox, check out our code guides for other games, such as Basketball Zero, Anime Last Stand, and Weak Legacy 2.
